description: When some field is required to be filled.
When a field has less than minimum accepted number of characters
When a field has more that maximum accepted number of characters
When a field does not start with a letter or contains invalid characters
defaultMessage: bir harf ile başlamalı ve yalnızca geçerli karakterler içermelidir

description: When the passphrases fields are different (when confirming the passphrase)
When the chosen username was already registered
When the akashaId is not valid
defaultMessage: Yalnızca küçük harf ve alfanümerik karakterlere izin veriliyor

description: Info message about maximum length of an excerpt
defaultMessage: Kısa yazılar en fazla 120 karakter olabilir
